long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access your Ultra Wallet within your browser. The Ultra Wallet is a non-custodial crypto wallet that allows you to store your UOS and Uniqs.

Independently audited by a top security firm, the Ultra Wallet Extension provides an easy and safe way to access Ultra blockchain-enabled distributed applications or "DApps" right within your browser! 

Ultra offers users the ability to create and manage their own identities using private keys and a local client wallet. This enables a secure interface for users to review any transactions initiated by a DApp before approving or rejecting them for writing to the blockchain.

Here are the core features of the Ultra Wallet Extension:

-  Instant transactions with ZERO fees, meaning you can get started with a 0 UOS balance on your account

-  Easily connect and use with all Ultra Dapps

 - Full control over your assets 

- No requirement to remember or store seed phrases with hassle-free wallet recovery
